title: സുഷമ സ്വരാജിനെ ആന്ധ്രപ്രദേശ് ഗവര്‍ണര്‍ ആയി നിയമിച്ചുവോ…?
author: www.malayalam.factcrescendo.com
vclaim: I called on the Vice President of India Shri Venkaiah Naidu ji on demitting office as Minister of External affairs. This was enough for Twitter to appoint me as the Governor of Andhra Pradesh.
